title: Public transport for the 16th FINA World Swimming Championship (25m): Tuesday 13 December to Sunday 18 December 2022
articleContent:
Public transport for the 16th FINA World Swimming Championship (25m): Tuesday 13 December to Sunday 18 December 2022

Public transport is helping people get to the Melbourne Sports and Aquatic Centre (MSAC) for the 16th FINA World Swimming Championship (25m) from Tuesday 13 December to Sunday 18 December 2022.

Heats morning session time 11am

Final evening session time 7:30pm

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

Tuesday 13 December to Sunday 18 December

Metropolitan tram

Getting to Melbourne Sports & Aquatic Centre (MSAC)

Additional tram service (Route 12a) will be running from 10:00am to 2:30pm & 6:00pm to 11:30pm from Stop # 122 Southern Cross Station/Spencer Street to stop #131 – Melbourne Sport & Aquatic Centre/Albert Rd

Passengers can also catch Route 12 (Stop #1 Spencer St/Collins St) to travel to MSAC alighting at stop #131 – Melbourne Sport & Aquatic Centre/Albert Rd

Leaving from Melbourne Sports & Aquatic Centre (MSAC)

Additional tram service (Route 12a) will be running from 10:00am to 2:30pm & 6:00pm to 11:30pm from Stop #131 – Melbourne Sport & Aquatic Centre/Albert Rd to Stop # 122 Southern Cross Station/Spencer Street.

Passengers can also catch Route 12 Stop #131 – Melbourne Sport & Aquatic Centre/Albert Rd to Stop #1 Spencer St/Collins St).

Metropolitan train

Getting to the MSAC

No additional services will operate. All services will run to a normal weekday & weekend timetable.

Customers arriving at Southern Cross stations are advised to change to tram Route 12/12a to travel to MSAC alighting at stop #131 – Melbourne Sport & Aquatic Centre/Albert Rd.

Leaving the MSAC

Customers are advised to get any trams from the MSAC and alight at Southern Cross station and change to a Metropolitan train.

Metropolitan bus

No additional services will operate. All services will run to a normal weekday / weekend timetable.

Regional train

No additional services will operate. All services will run to a normal weekday / weekend timetable.

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
articleDescription: Public transport for the 16th FINA World Swimming Championship (25m): Tuesday 13 to Sunday 18 December 2022
